NHSNPathogenRanking

Ordinal rankings for the relative importance of a pathogen in that set with respect to its role in the infection.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.96
    CodeDisplay
    255216001First
    81170007Second
    70905002Third

name: NHSNPathogenRanking
description: Ordinal rankings for the relative importance of a pathogen in that set with respect to its role in the infection.
